name: Landhaus Hochstein
description: Holiday in the good old wonderful mountain world, with it's gift of pure drinking water and the exhilarating alpine air. Your destination is the mountains, the nature, the various sporting activities, the meadows in bloom, the forests. Combine that with the right holiday accommodation to create a harmonious holiday experience! Landhaus Hochstein will fulfill all your expectations.
The price includes electricity, heating, water, sauna and VAT; Excludes lcoal taxes, a final cleaning charge, delivered bread, solarium, hay bath and massage.

Check in from 14.00hr, check out until 10.00hr.
Directions: At Mayrhofen carry on straight ahead at the roundabout and after approx. 300m turn left at Einfahrt Mitte, another 200m until the next junction, turn right and up the high street (one way road), over the Ziller Bridge and then left into the Ahornstrasse, 400m on to Landhaus Hochatein.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower or bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Furnished in local wood, creating a pleasant and especially healthy living atmosphere. Great attention has been paid to detail, finishing off the natural ambience. Experience peace and quiet and a feeling of well being - enjoy the natural spring water in the "Sauna Dreieck".
